title: Static Lung Compliance (Cstat) Calculation
desc: The Static Compliance (Cstat) Calculation calculates pressure needed to overcome elastic resistance to ventilation.

orgreference.text: Marshall R. The physical properties of the lungs in relation to the subdivisions of lung volume. Clin Sci. 1957;16(3):507-15.

data.evidence: Static lung compliance (Cstat), mL/cm H2O = Corrected/delivered tidal volume (ΔV), mL / (Plateau pressure (Pplat), cm H2O – PEEP, cm H2O)
data.facts:
Interpretation:

Normal static lung compliance is 50-100 mL/cm H2O.
